title: The Careful Use of Compliments
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: She left the delicatessen and began to walk down the street in   the   direction   of  Chamberlain   Road. The   brow   of Churchhill rose gently in front of her, and at the end, beyond the  rise, were  the  Pentlands, blue  at this distance, with  a mantle of low cloud.
